description: This file defines a mock class `Store2NotificationMock` for unit testing, which implements the `INotification` interface from the `WPEFramework::Exchange::IStore2` namespace. It includes mock method definitions for testing notifications related to store value changes.
external_methods: MOCK_METHOD(void, ValueChanged, (const WPEFramework::Exchange::IStore2::ScopeType scope, const string& ns, const string& key, const string& value), (override))

classes.name: Store2NotificationMock
classes.description: A mock class for the `INotification` interface to facilitate unit testing of store notification behavior.

methods.name: ~Store2NotificationMock
methods.description: Default destructor for the mock class.

methods.name: ValueChanged
methods.description: Mock method to simulate notification of a value change in the store.
